author: CBC News
title: Trudeau announces sanctions on Putin, calls for Russia's removal from SWIFT banking system | CBC News
description: Canada will impose sanctions directly on Russian President Vladimir Putin and his inner circle of advisers, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced Friday afternoon.
content:
Canada will impose sanctions directly on Russian President Vladimir Putin and his inner circle of advisers, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced Friday afternoon.
